title: Hour 3 - Little League Sportsmanship, Fred Segal
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Little League Sportsmanship, Fred Segal
description:
Dan revisits the sportsmanship displayed yesterday at the Little League World Series. And he talks to author Fred Segal about some freezing cold takes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
